targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "public"."client"."protocol" AS "protocol",
  COUNT(*) AS "count"
FROM
  "public"."client"
WHERE
  "public"."client"."realm_id" not in ( 'standard','idir','azureidir','bceidbusiness','bceidboth','github','master','bceidbasic')
  AND  ("public"."client"."client_id" not in ('account', 'account-console','admin-cli','broker','realm-management','security-admin-console'  ))
GROUP BY
  "public"."client"."protocol"
ORDER BY
  "public"."client"."protocol" ASC

SELECT
  "public"."client"."protocol" AS "protocol",
  COUNT(*) AS "count"
FROM
  "public"."client"
WHERE
  "public"."client"."realm_id" not in ( 'standard','idir','azureidir','bceidbusiness','bceidboth','github','master','bceidbasic')
  AND  ("public"."client"."client_id" not in ('account', 'account-console','admin-cli','broker','realm-management','security-admin-console'  ))
GROUP BY
  "public"."client"."protocol"
ORDER BY
  "public"."client"."protocol" ASC

SELECT
  "public"."client"."protocol" AS "protocol",
  COUNT(*) AS "count"
FROM
  "public"."client"
WHERE
  "public"."client"."realm_id" not in ( 'standard','idir','azureidir','bceidbusiness','bceidboth','github','master','bceidbasic')
  AND  ("public"."client"."client_id" not in ('account', 'account-console','admin-cli','broker','realm-management','security-admin-console'  ))
GROUP BY
  "public"."client"."protocol"
ORDER BY
  "public"."client"."protocol" ASC

targets.rawSql:
select realm.id
from realm where realm.name not in ('idir','azureidir','bceidbusiness','bceidboth','github','master','bceidbasic','standard')

SELECT
  AVG("source"."count") AS "avg"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      "public"."client"."realm_id" AS "realm_id",
      COUNT(*) AS "count"
    FROM
      "public"."client"
   
WHERE
      (
        (
          "public"."client"."realm_id" not in (
            'standard',
            'idir',
            'azureidir',
            'bceidbusiness',
            'bceidboth',
            'github',
            'master',
            'bceidbasic'
          )
        )
       
    OR ("public"."client"."realm_id" IS NULL)
      )
     
   AND (
        ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'account')
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'account-console')
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'admin-cli')
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'broker')
        OR (
          "public"."client"."client_id" <> 'realm-management'
        )
        OR (
          "public"."client"."client_id" <> 'security-admin-console'
        )
      )
   
GROUP BY
      "public"."client"."realm_id"
   
ORDER BY
      count desc
  ) AS "source"

SELECT
  AVG("source"."count") AS "avg"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      "public"."client"."realm_id" AS "realm_id",
      COUNT(*) AS "count"
    FROM
      "public"."client"
   
WHERE
      (
        (
          "public"."client"."realm_id" not in (
            'standard',

            'azureidir',
            'bceidbusiness',

            'github',
            'master',
            'bceidbasic'
          )
        )
       
    OR ("public"."client"."realm_id" IS NULL)
      )
     
   AND (
        ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'account')
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'account-console')
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'admin-cli')
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'broker')
        OR (
          "public"."client"."client_id" <> 'realm-management'
        )
        OR (
          "public"."client"."client_id" <> 'security-admin-console'
        )
      )
   
GROUP BY
      "public"."client"."realm_id"
   
ORDER BY
      count desc
  ) AS "source"

SELECT
  AVG("source"."count") AS "avg"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      "public"."client"."realm_id" AS "realm_id",
      COUNT(*) AS "count"
    FROM
      "public"."client"
   
WHERE
      (
        (
          "public"."client"."realm_id" not in (
            'standard',
            'idir',
            'azureidir',
            'bceidbusiness',
            'bceidboth',
            'github',
            'master',
            'bceidbasic'
          )
        )
       
    OR ("public"."client"."realm_id" IS NULL)
      )
     
   AND (
        ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'account')
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'account-console')
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'admin-cli')
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
        OR ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'broker')
        OR (
          "public"."client"."client_id" <> 'realm-management'
        )
        OR (
          "public"."client"."client_id" <> 'security-admin-console'
        )
      )
   
GROUP BY
      "public"."client"."realm_id"
   
ORDER BY
      count desc
  ) AS "source"

SELECT
  AVG("source"."count") AS "avg"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      "public"."client"."realm_id" AS "realm_id",
      count(*) AS "count"
    FROM
      "public"."client"
   
WHERE
      (
        "public"."client"."realm_id" not in (
          'standard',

          'github',
          'master',

        )
       
   AND "public"."client"."service_accounts_enabled" = TRUE
      )
   
GROUP BY

ORDER BY

  ) AS "source"

FROM

    FROM

   AND "public"."client"."service_accounts_enabled" = TRUE

ORDER BY

  ) AS "source"

FROM

options.content:
# Context

Leadership and IDIM partners may want to know how many custom realms have bc services card as an integration. THis section shows this as we currently do not offer a BCSC integration in our standard service.

panels.title: BC Services Card in  custom realm

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(distinct realm.name) AS "Dev Count"
FROM
  "public"."identity_provider_mapper"
 
LEFT JOIN realm ON identity_provider_mapper.realm_id = realm.id
WHERE
LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc%'
  OR    LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%services%'

SELECT
  COUNT(distinct realm.name) AS "Test Count"
FROM
  "public"."identity_provider_mapper"
 
LEFT JOIN realm ON identity_provider_mapper.realm_id = realm.id
WHERE
LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc%'
  OR    LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%services%'

SELECT
  COUNT(distinct realm.name) AS "Prod Count"
FROM
  "public"."identity_provider_mapper"
 
LEFT JOIN realm ON identity_provider_mapper.realm_id = realm.id
WHERE
LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc%'
  OR    LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%services%'

panels.title: Average Number of realms with  BCSC

targets.rawSql:
select  ip.realm_id, ipc.value
from identity_provider as ip, identity_provider_config  as  ipc where ipc.identity_provider_id=ip.internal_id
 AND  (ip.provider_alias like '%bcsc%' OR ip.provider_alias like  '%services%' OR ip.provider_alias like '%bcsc-mobile%')
AND  ipc.name ='jwksUrl'

panels.title: BCSC JWK url (adjust query for URL)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
distinct "Realm"."name" AS "Realm__name"
 
FROM
  "public"."identity_provider_mapper"
 
LEFT JOIN "public"."realm" AS "Realm" ON "public"."identity_provider_mapper"."realm_id" = "Realm"."id"
WHERE
  LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc-mobile%'
  OR    LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc%'
  OR    LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%services%'

SELECT
distinct "Realm"."name" AS "Realm__name"
 
FROM
  "public"."identity_provider_mapper"
 
LEFT JOIN "public"."realm" AS "Realm" ON "public"."identity_provider_mapper"."realm_id" = "Realm"."id"
WHERE
  LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc-mobile%'
  OR    LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc%'
  OR    LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%services%'

SELECT
distinct "Realm"."name" AS "Realm__name"
 
FROM
  "public"."identity_provider_mapper"
 
LEFT JOIN "public"."realm" AS "Realm" ON "public"."identity_provider_mapper"."realm_id" = "Realm"."id"
WHERE
  LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc-mobile%'
  OR    LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc%'
  OR    LOWER("public"."identity_provider_mapper"."idp_alias") LIKE '%services%'

panels.description: Realms in dev who have set the legacy redirect uri parameter to true in some idp

targets.rawSql: select realm_id from identity_provider_config join identity_provider on identity_provider_config.identity_provider_id = identity_provider.internal_id where name ilike '%redirect%' and value='true' limit 10;

panels.title: Realms using legacy redirect uri

targets.rawSql:
select c1.realm_id, count (kr.name) 
from client c1, keycloak_role kr
where  kr.client = c1.id
and c1.realm_id NOT LIKE 'standard'
AND c1.realm_id IN ( select r.name from realm r, identity_provider_mapper ipm where  ipm.realm_id=r.id AND (LOWER(ipm."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc-mobile%'   OR    LOWER(ipm."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc%'   OR    LOWER(ipm."idp_alias") LIKE '%services%') )
group by c1.realm_id

select c1.realm_id, count (kr.name) 
from client c1, keycloak_role kr
where  kr.client = c1.id
and c1.realm_id NOT LIKE 'standard'
AND c1.realm_id IN ( select r.name from realm r, identity_provider_mapper ipm where  ipm.realm_id=r.id AND (LOWER(ipm."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc-mobile%'   OR    LOWER(ipm."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc%'   OR    LOWER(ipm."idp_alias") LIKE '%services%') )
group by c1.realm_id

select c1.realm_id, count (kr.name) 
from client c1, keycloak_role kr
where  kr.client = c1.id
and c1.realm_id NOT LIKE 'standard'
AND c1.realm_id IN ( select r.name from realm r, identity_provider_mapper ipm where  ipm.realm_id=r.id AND (LOWER(ipm."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc-mobile%'   OR    LOWER(ipm."idp_alias") LIKE '%bcsc%'   OR    LOWER(ipm."idp_alias") LIKE '%services%') )
group by c1.realm_id
